title: Brown University launches new campus recovery effort in wake of fatal shooting
author: Carson Lyle
bullets: Local News “The Brown community is resilient, caring, and strong.
We are ever true.

” A couple embrace at a makeshift memorial outside the Barus & Holley Engineering and Physics Building at Brown University, where two people were killed and nine people were injured by a gunman, in Providence, RI on December 19, 2025.

title: Boston nightclub where woman suffered medical emergency and died has license reinstated
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News After hearing testimony from club representatives and the loved ones of a woman who died there Dec.
21, regulators found no violations.
ICON, a nightclub in Boston's Theater District, had its entertainment license reinstated at a hearing Thursday.

title: Red Sox legend revealed on ‘Masked Singer’ premiere
author: Shannon Murphy
bullets: TV David Ortiz appeared on the show as “Googly Eyes,” performing DJ Snake and Lil Jon’s “Turn Down for What.

” Big Papi might be known for his connection to a Green Monster, but he was revealed to be the celeb behind a red monster costume on Wednesday night’s Season 14 premiere of “The Masked Singer” on Fox.
The reality TV singing competition features celebrities performing popular songs while disguised in elaborate full body costumes.
